title: Which is correct, penalty in the agreement or on the agreement? - Quora

response.answer_text: Neither is correct. “Penalty in the agreement” and “penalty on the agreement” do not make sense. I think you mean ‘in accordance with the agreement,’ therefore you can say, “penalty as per agreement.” So, penalty as stipulated in the agreement, penalty as provided for in the agreement, penalty as stated in the agreement. You can use any of these. It is IN and not ON.
